#summary Tutorial: Building a SADI Service in Perl

= Building a SADI Service in Perl =

This tutorial describes how a service provider can use SADI::Simple to create, test, and deploy a SADI service in Perl.

== Requirements ==

This tutorial requires:

  * Perl
  * apache (the default configuration is probably sufficient)
  * SADI::Simple (install via CPAN)

== Service template ==
